title: Ultimate Step-by-Step Guide to Building a RAG Chatbot from Scratch
description: Learn how to build a powerful Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) chatbot from scratch with our step-by-step guide, using Python, FAISS, and the OpenAI API.
author: Muhammad Umer Bhutta

title: Prompt Engineering 101: Best Practices for Crafting Effective Queries
description: Master prompt engineering for GPT-4, LLaMA 3, and Gemma with practical techniques—from zero-shot and few-shot to chain-of-thought and role-based prompting—illustrated with examples and visual guides.
author: Muhammad Umer Bhutta

title: Fine-Tuning vs. In-Context Learning: Customizing LLMs for Your Workflow
description: Compare approaches for tailoring models to your domain—including full fine-tuning, parameter-efficient tuning (LoRA), and prompt-based methods—with real healthcare use cases and practical trade-offs.
author: Muhammad Umer Bhutta

title: Introduction to LangChain: Building Blocks for LLM Applications
description: Learn LangChain's essential building blocks like chains, prompt templates, and memory, and build a conversational RAG system using Python, Hugging Face, and open-source LLMs like Llama 3.
author: Muhammad Umer Bhutta

title: LangGraph 101: Building Stateful AI Workflows in Python
description: A beginner-friendly guide to LangGraph, covering Python building blocks, core concepts like state, nodes, edges, conditional logic, tools, and messages for building stateful AI agent workflows on top of LangChain.
author: Muhammad Umer Bhutta
